document.full_text: mitt romney addressed the health care law he once championed in his own home state by calling for a repeal of the health care law president obama signed last year.
document.title: romney defends massachusetts health plan, but concedes flaws
lines_and_colors: mitt romney addressed the health care law he once championed in his own home state by calling for a repeal of the health care law president obama signed last year.
